name: Telegram Radio Player V3
description: An Telegram Bot By Safone to Play Nonstop Radio/Music/YouTube Live in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: User Accounts Telegram API_ID get it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: User Accounts Telegram API_HASH get it from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token, get it from @Botfather XD

SESSION_STRING.description: User Session String, get it from @genStr_robot. Read readme to learn more

CHAT.description: ID of your Channel or Group where the bot plays Radio/Music/YouTube Lives

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist if CHAT is a Group, if channel then leave blank

ADMINS.description: ID of Auth Users who can use Admin commands (for multiple users seperated by space)

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Change it to 'True' If you want to make /play commands only for admins of CHAT. By default /play is available for all.

MAXIMUM_DURATION.description: Maximum Duration of a song to be played by using /play command

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio Station or Youtube Live video url to stream with /radio command

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message to those who message the USER account in PM. Make it blank if you do not need this feature.
